About us

Trailblazer GmbH is the software company behind Trailblazer. Based in Berlin, and with our consultants and gem developers around the world, we offer consulting and training for all things Trailblazer.

Our company reinvests our funds straight back into developing all Trailblazer gems, better documentation and support, plus building up a nice team of fantastic people to help you with Trailblazer.
